lead_paragraph: A Canadian man was charged with seven offenses after he injured two soldiers with a knife at a military recruiting center in northern Toronto.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Man Charged in Attack at Recruiting Center
headline.main: Canada: Man Charged in Attack at Recruiting Center

snippet: A Canadian man was charged with seven offenses after he injured two soldiers with a knife at a military recruiting center in northern Toronto.
abstract: Canadian authorities charge Ayanle Hassan Ali with seven offenses for injuring two soldiers in knife attack at military recruitment center in Toronto; do not know if Ali is radical Islamist.
